status.help: Enable/disable statistics collection for when no external logging destination, such as FortiAnalyzer, is present (data is not saved).
status.name: status

options.help: Enable statistics collection for when no external logging destination, such as FortiAnalyzer, is present (data is not saved).
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable statistics collection for when no external logging destination, such as FortiAnalyzer, is present (data is not saved).
options.name: disable
